name: T-rex game plus
description:
T-rex game +

the Google Chrome's game with lot of upgrade like:

  • A high score system
  • A new object : a straw ball move more fast than other objects
  • A  horizontal movement
  • An egg
  • A cute and anime wallpaper
  • Other feature...

What I want make in the future:

  • money system
  • some hats (with money system)
  • more enemies
  • some bonus (with money system)
  • add auto-installing system to avoid DLL issue
